channel.title: data on Does the 2018-2019 season really show the best/worst teams?
channel.description: Recent content in data on Does the 2018-2019 season really show the best/worst teams?

item.title: Barcelona or Real Madrid? Who is the better team in the biggest rivalry in the world?
item.description: The world has many rivalries around the world, within countries, within leagues, even within divisions and cities. Everyone might not be into soccer but most people know of Barcelona and Real Madrid. Recently named the two highest valued teams in the world, Barcelona and Real Madrid have a rivalry that is unparalleled to any other rivalry in any other sport. In the last 10 years the rivalry has brewed with one of the greatest of all time Cristiano Ronaldo leaving Real Madrid.

item.title: 2018-2019 Premier League Season
item.description: In this blog I am going to be looking at the last Premier League Season without any stoppage/controversy and look at which team/teams were the best and worst at home and away matches. The 2018-2019 Premier League season came down to the last game of the season with Manchester City needing a victory to win the title, which they did on Matchday 38. My personal favorite team Liverpool lost only one game and did not win, so I wanted to see if the table results actually truly represents which teams preformed the best.
